name: 100 Rolls
description:
Control:

  • movement - A, D or Left and Right Arrow
  • jump - W or SPACE or Up Arrow
  • settings - S

Jump or collect coins to obtain score points.

Game created fo GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Symbols:

  • red skull - enemy
  • gray cross - trap
  • blue rectangle - platform
  • yellow circle - coin
  • blue hammer/sword - weapons

KnownBugs:

  • help button can´t be pressed
  • after playing infinity mode other modes aren´t roll-limited
  • sometimes coin may appear in the wall
